document_data.name: Stone Goat
document_data.mainbody: The '''Stone Goat''' was a paddock marker in [[Jester's Green]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: [[Eskrel Starbridge]] used that marker to coordinate his knights' foray to [[Shadowdale]] in his {{yearlink|1479}} mission to search through the [[Dalelands]] for the fugitive [[wizard]] [[Elminster Aumar]].
